member.name: M:LibrarySystem.ViaNettSMS.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Constructor with username and password to ViaNett gateway.

member.name: M:LibrarySystem.ViaNettSMS.SendSMS(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Send SMS message through the ViaNett HTTP API.
member.returns: Returns an object with the following parameters: Success, ErrorCode, ErrorMessage
member.param: Message sender address. Mobile number or small text, e.g. company name

member.name: M:LibrarySystem.ViaNettSMS.DownloadString(System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the URL from the server, and returns the response as string.
member.returns: Returns the http/xml response as string
member.exception: WebException is thrown if there is a connection problem.

member.name: M:LibrarySystem.ViaNettSMS.ParseServerResult(System.String)
member.summary: Parses the XML code and returns a Result object.
member.param: XML data from a request through HTTP API.
member.returns: Returns a Result object with the parsed data.

member.name: T:LibrarySystem.ViaNettSMS.Result
member.summary: The Result object from the SendSMS function, which returns Success(Boolean), ErrorCode(Integer), ErrorMessage(String).

member.name: T:LibrarySystem.ViaNettSMS
member.summary: ViaNett SMS class provides an easy way of sending SMS messages through the HTTP API.
